data.name: Warface — Weapon set "Counter-terrorist pack"
data.detailed_description:
About the "Counter-terrorist" set


These are the deadliest guns, perfect for those who are used to setting the rules of the game. Sweep the floor with your opponent thanks to the unusual type of firing off your rifle and finish them off using pistol power. Play the game by your own rules!



The set includes two types of weapons: a pistol, which is suitable for any class in the game (except for the SED) and a rifle for the Riflemen.

H&K USP

This is a sufficiently compact and easy-to-handle pistol with a large magazine capacity and high rate of fire, capable to outshoot your opponents in any battle.

Famas F1

This is a unique bullpup assault rifle that fires in bursts for three rounds. The weapon has very high damage as well as great accuracy in both aiming modes and when shooting from the hip. The characteristics of the fire rate take into account the peculiarity of the weapon: shooting in bursts of three rounds.





After payment, the items will appear on your in-game account. Wait 15 minutes or restart the game if necessary.

data.short_description: The set consists of two killer weapons that bring energy to the game. With them, you won’t let your enemy get bored!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Polish*, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean, Russian*, Turkish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i3-530 / AMD Athlon II X3 415e
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 250 GTS / Radeon HD 4850
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5 3470 / AMD Athlon 240GE
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 1050 Ti / Radeon R9 380
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
